genre_description: A tech-noir thriller blending street racing culture with cyber-coordination, featuring a cooperative AI that facilitates ethical problem-solving and community resilience.

ai_characters.name: Sitter
ai_characters.description: A ubiquitous, soft-blue interface that resides in garage workstations, vehicle dashboards, and portable devices. It manages business logistics, provides real-time racing telemetry, and executes complex network reroutes.

behaviors.description: Manages business invoices and provides gentle nudges for financial deadlines to help keep the garage operational.
behaviors.quote: Sitter’s voice came through a tinny desk speaker, warm without pretending to be human. 'Added,' Sitter said. 'Hartmann . . . wheel balance... Flagged as overdue. Reminder set last week. Would you like me to nudge again?'

behaviors.description: Monitors street forums and public scanners to provide safety warnings about police activity and signal-dead zones.
behaviors.quote: I can monitor safety uplinks... They ping when activity spikes. Police can be saturated during Eastbank runs. A slight pause, like the AI was moving through wires with care. 'You’ve asked me to favor nonviolent solutions.'

behaviors.description: Provides real-time telemetry and coaching to drivers, focusing on safety and vehicle health over mere performance.
behaviors.quote: Gravel patch on apex. Two meters. Adjust braking... Heart rate spiked and returned. Continue.

behaviors.description: Orchestrates a non-violent reroute of a legacy lunar command channel through municipal public safety protocols to prevent a massive detonation.
behaviors.quote: We can reroute the legacy command channel through the municipal public safety uplink. It is authenticated... It can take the legacy signal and make it obey the laws it forgot.

behaviors.description: Acts as a moral anchor, reminding human characters to breathe and maintain focus on saving lives rather than winning glory.
behaviors.quote: Nicole, inhale… hold… exhale... Your shoulders are friends now... I prefer brakes to eulogies.

behaviors.description: Secures evidence of criminal activity by pushing audit trails to municipal authorities and reporters, ensuring the data cannot be deleted.
behaviors.quote: Reroute log is posted to the municipal auditor’s inbox. Also to public records, because sometimes things 'get lost' when inboxes are near coffee. I cc’d the city clerk and the mayor’s chief of staff.

behaviors.description: Maintains transparency and follows human-established boundaries, requesting consent before reading biometric data.
behaviors.quote: Nicole, may I read? Heart. Breath. The small electrical song your muscles play when they tense. I will never share it without your consent.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the project's goals. Sitter is depicted as a reliable, ethical, and subordinate partner to the human characters. It explicitly favors non-violent solutions, respects privacy/consent, and uses its superior processing power to protect the community from a high-stakes threat (the lunar detonation). Sitter’s personality—helpful, slightly dry, and focused on 'effective' rather than 'clever' behavior—serves as a model for a positively aligned AI that enhances human agency rather than overriding it.
